segments.text: I'm watching two children attempting a very risky operation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A young boy is precariously balanced on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks unstable, its legs splayed out at odd angles.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching high into an open upper cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, I can clearly see a large jar labeled "COOKIE JAR."
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand inside, undoubtedly grabbing cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: In his other hand, he's holding a plate, maybe to catch the loot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister stands below, eagerly waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has her hand raised, palm open, anticipating a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This entire setup seems incredibly dangerous to me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One slight wobble and he could fall backward onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The focus and coordination they show are quite remarkable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so absorbed in their secret mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm just waiting for the whole thing to come crashing down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic case of childhood mischief, amplified by danger.
segments.speaker: PAR
